platen-details.title: Details
platen-details.description:
Insert a collapsible panel of Markdown content with a title.
For more information, see https://localhost:1313/modules/platen/markup/details

fields.name: class
fields.title: Zero or more classes to add to the details element as a space-separated list.

fields.name: level
fields.title: The heading level to insert for the summary of the details element. This turns the details element into a collapsible section if the value is 1 through 6. The default (no heading) is 0.

fields.name: id
fields.title: The custom ID to give the details element. Must have a `#` prefix.

fields.name: linkable
fields.title: Whether the details should have be linkable by ID.

fields.name: open
fields.title: Whether the details should be open when the page loads.
